message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value for you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $12,000. This is a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a price that reflects its worth to you while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and financial plans. I look forward to your response.
